intro.title: About the Game
intro.description:
Project Mothership is intended to be a cooperative rogue-like with souls inspired combat in a top-down 2.5D stylised perspective.
It is developed by students of the Stuttgart Media University in the lecture Games Internship. A team of 24 students is tasked with developing a game, organizing the development process on their own, and to present it at the end of the semester at the Universities' MediaNight event.
